languages.text: El {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Ataque desmantelador{/g} también lisia al enemigo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en −30 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 攻撃解体により敵を損傷させ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を−30減少させる。
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃解体により敵を損傷させ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を−30減少させる。

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Entwaffnender Angriff{/g} verkrüppelt den Feind außerdem, was seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 reduziert.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Entwaffnender Angriff{/g} verkrüppelt den Feind außerdem, was seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 reduziert.

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Attaque de démantèlement{/g} pénalise également l'ennemi, réduisant sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de −30 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Attaque de démantèlement pénalise également l'ennemi, réduisant sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de −30 jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Söken Saldırı{/g}, düşmanı ayrıca kötürüm bırakarak {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini 30 puan azaltır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c4c25ebbdea341c5a153c073240d574d}Dismantling Attack{/g} also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.
